title: Improving housing stability for tenants subject to the residential landlord-tenant act and the manufactured/mobile home landlord-tenant act by limiting rent and fee increases, requiring notice of rent and fee increases, limiting fees and deposits, establishing a landlord resource center and associated services, authorizing tenant lease termination, creating parity between lease types, and providing for attorney general enforcement.

actions.description: Public hearing in the House Committee on Housing at 1:30 PM.
Executive action taken in the House Committee on Housing at 1:30 PM.
HOUS - Majority; 1st substitute bill be substituted, do pass.
Public hearing in the House Committee on Appropriations at 4:00 PM.
Executive action taken in the House Committee on Appropriations at 4:00 PM.
APP - Majority; 2nd substitute bill be substituted, do pass.
Rules Committee relieved of further consideration.  Placed on second reading.
Rules suspended.  Placed on Third Reading.
Third reading, passed; yeas, 53; nays, 42; absent, 0; excused, 3.
Public hearing in the Senate Committee on Housing at 1:30 PM.
Executive action taken in the Senate Committee on Housing at 10:30 AM.
HSG - Majority; do pass with amendment(s).
Public hearing in the Senate Committee on Ways & Means at 1:30 PM.
Executive action taken in the Senate Committee on Ways & Means at 1:30 PM.
WM - Majority; do pass with amendment(s).
Passed to Rules Committee for second reading.
Placed on second reading by Rules Committee.
Rules suspended.  Placed on Third Reading.
Third reading, passed; yeas, 29; nays, 20; absent, 0; excused, 0.
House refuses to concur in the Senate amendments.
Conference committee appointed.  Representatives Peterson, Macri, Low.
Conference committee appointed.  Senators Bateman, Alvarado, Goehner.
Bill as amended violated Senate Rule 25.
Vote on adoption of conference committee report reconsidered.
Conference committee appointed.  Senators Bateman, Alvarado, Goehner.
Conference committee appointed.  Representatives Fitzgibbon, Peterson, Low.
Passed final passage as recommended by conference committee; yeas, 27; nays, 20; absent, 0; excused, 1.
Passed final passage as recommended by conference committee; yeas, 54; nays, 44; absent, 0; excused, 0.
